div.p: Mapping from CH VACD Snomed CT for vaccine code to CH VACD Target disease and illnesses undergone for immunization

ACTIVE. Published on 2024-05-16 11:02:13+0000 by HL7 Switzerland (HL7 Switzerland: https://www.hl7.ch/, HL7 Switzerland: https://www.hl7.ch/). This artefact includes content from SNOMED Clinical Terms速 (SNOMED CT速) which is copyright of the International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO). Implementers of these artefacts must have the appropriate SNOMED CT Affiliate license - for more information contact http://www.snomed.org/snomed-ct/getsnomed-ct or info@snomed.org.
Mappings from SnomedCT vaccine code to target disease according to the correcsponding valuesets
Group 1 Mapping from SNOMED CT (all versions) to SNOMED CT (all versions)
